DataElement.preferredName: Musculoskeletal Tumor Society Rating Scale Calculated Extremity Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical value representing the calculated physical functioning score of an individual with musculoskeletal cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Musculoskeletal Tumor Society Rating Scale Calculated Extremity Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A physician-completed measure used to assess extremity function in patients undergoing surgery for musculoskeletal cancer. The scale scores for function and acceptance by 6 variables for upper extremities and 6 variables for lower extremities._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity.A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
